parameters.Name: searchTerms
parameters.Description: The keyword terms to search for.

parameters.Name: startPage
parameters.Description: The page of results to return.  Defaults to '1'.  May not be honored if there isn't enough pages of results.

parameters.Name: perPage
parameters.Description: The number of search results per page of results.  Defaults is 20.  Maximum is limited to 1000.

parameters.Name: order
parameters.Description: The order to return results in.  If not specified, uses metachannels_rank.

parameters.Name: types
parameters.Description: The type of search results items to restrict the search to.  Default is shows.

parameters.Name: fields
parameters.Description: Restrict the search to just the fields specified.  Supported fields are: 'title', 'description', 'keywords', 'show_title'.  If multiple fields are specified separate by a comma.

parameters.Name: format
parameters.Description: The keyword terms to search for.
